player.description: A green plush dinosaur toy with a rounded body, stubby arms and legs, and a light yellow belly patch.

world.description: A modern office setting with desks, chairs, and various office supplies.

platforms.description: A black ergonomic office chair with a high back and padding.
platforms.effect: Allows the player to jump higher.

platforms.description: A plain white ceramic coffee mug.
platforms.behavior: Wobbly platform, tilts when landed upon.
platforms.effect: Adds a slight bounce to the jump.

collectables.description: A rolled cake slice with a golden brown outer layer and a ripe red strawberry on top.
collectables.behavior: Idle, floating slightly in the air.
collectables.effect: Collecting increases score and provides a small jump boost.

narrative.transition: The green plush dinosaur finds itself transported from its cozy bed to an office setting.
narrative.current_story: The dinosaur explores the office, jumping between furniture and collecting items.
narrative.next_story: The dinosaur discovers a hidden passage leading to a whimsical meadow filled with colorful flowers.

content.visual_style: Realist photographic style with natural lighting.

player.description: A green plush dinosaur toy with a rounded body, stubby arms and legs, and a light yellow belly patch.

world.description: A vibrant, fantastical meadow filled with colorful flowers and whimsical elements, under a bright blue sky with fluffy clouds.

platforms.description: A fluffy white cloud with two black dot eyes and a round shape.
platforms.behavior: Disappears after a short time when stepped on.
platforms.effect: Provides a high bounce before vanishing.

platforms.description: A black spherical creature with stubby legs and a shiny surface.
platforms.effect: Grants a speed boost upon jumping off.

collectables.description: A flying straw hat with a wide brim and a sunflower decoration.
collectables.effect: Collecting grants a temporary glide ability.

narrative.transition: The green plush dinosaur, after exploring the office setting, discovers a hidden door that opens to a vibrant meadow.
narrative.current_story: The dinosaur navigates through the fantastical meadow, jumping on clouds and interacting with whimsical creatures.
narrative.next_story: The dinosaur spots a distant shimmering portal at the edge of the meadow, hinting at another adventure.

content.visual_style: Whimsical, painterly illustration with soft brush strokes and bright, pastel colors.

player.description: A green plush dinosaur toy with a rounded body, stubby arms and legs, and a light yellow belly patch, now holding a small pinwheel that spins in the wind.

world.description: A vibrant, fantastical meadow filled with colorful flowers and whimsical elements, under a bright blue sky with fluffy clouds. The wind gently sways the flowers and trees.

platforms.description: A fluffy white cloud with two black dot eyes and a round shape.
platforms.behavior: Drifts slowly with the wind, disappearing after a short time when stepped on.
platforms.effect: Provides a high bounce before vanishing.

platforms.description: A black spherical creature with stubby legs and a shiny surface.
platforms.behavior: Moves horizontally back and forth, now slightly faster due to the wind.
platforms.effect: Grants a speed boost upon jumping off.

collectables.description: A flying straw hat with a wide brim and a sunflower decoration.
collectables.behavior: Floats gently up and down, occasionally carried by the wind.
collectables.effect: Collecting grants a temporary glide ability.

narrative.transition: A sudden gust of wind sweeps through the meadow, stirring the flowers and clouds.
narrative.current_story: The green plush dinosaur enjoys the breezy meadow, jumping on drifting clouds and interacting with whimsical creatures.
narrative.next_story: The dinosaur notices a group of flying umbrellas in the distance, carried by the wind, and decides to follow them to see where they lead.

content.visual_style: Whimsical, painterly illustration with soft brush strokes and bright, pastel colors.
